trans-unit.source: Provides a base class for a member of a type.
trans-unit.target: Inneholder en basisklasse for et medlem av en type.

trans-unit.source: Type members include fields, methods, properties, constructors and nested types.
trans-unit.target: Typen medlemmer inkludere felt, metoder, egenskaper, konstruktører og nestede typer.

trans-unit.source: The CodeTypeMember class can be used to represent the declaration for a member of a type.
trans-unit.target: Klassen CodeTypeMember kan brukes til å representere deklarasjonen for et medlem av en type.

trans-unit.source: CodeTypeMember is a base class from which more specific types of members are derived, such as <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberField> and <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod>.
trans-unit.target: CodeTypeMember er en basisklasse som mer spesifikke typer medlemmer er avledet fra, for eksempel <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberField>og <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod>.</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberMethod> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMemberField>

trans-unit.source: This class contains properties and methods common to all type members.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen inneholder egenskaper og metoder som er felles for alle medlemmer i typen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeTypeMember"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir attributtene for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: This property is used to specify the attributes of the type member.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes til å angi attributtene for typemedlemmet.

trans-unit.source: Member attributes are classified in groups, with a mask for each group.
trans-unit.target: Medlemsattributter klassifiseres i grupper, med en maske for hver gruppe.

trans-unit.source: The access group consists of flags containing the terms `Public`, `Private`, `Family`, or `Assembly`.
trans-unit.target: Tilgang tilgangsgruppen består av flaggene som inneholder vilkårene `Public`, `Private`, `Family`, eller `Assembly`.

trans-unit.source: The scope group includes flags for <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, and <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>.
trans-unit.target: Område-gruppen inkluderer flagg for <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>, og <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>.</xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes> </xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes> </xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes> </xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes> </xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes> mask identifies the access attributes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>masken identifiserer attributtene tilgang.</xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes> mask identifies the scope attributes.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>masken identifiserer attributtene omfang.</xref:System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes>

trans-unit.source: The default value for the Attributes property includes flags from both access and scope.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for egenskapen attributter inneholder flagg fra både tilgang og omfang.

trans-unit.source: To change either access or scope, first mask out the existing flags and then set the new value.
trans-unit.target: Første masken ut den eksisterende flagg for å endre tilgang eller området, og angi deretter den nye verdien.

trans-unit.source: For example, the code statement to identify a constructor (named `constructor1`) as public is `constructor1.Attributes = (constructor1.Attributes & ~MemberAttributes.AccessMask) | MemberAttributes.Public;`.
trans-unit.target: For eksempel uttrykket koden til å identifisere en konstruktør (navnet `constructor1`) som public `constructor1.Attributes = (constructor1.Attributes & ~MemberAttributes.AccessMask) | MemberAttributes.Public;`.

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes"></xref> values used to indicate the attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: En bitvis kombinasjon av det <xref href="System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes"> </xref> verdier som brukes til å angi attributtene for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref href="System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes"></xref> | <xref href="System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The default value is <xref href="System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes"></xref> | <xref href="System.CodeDom.MemberAttributes"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of comments for the type member.
trans-unit.target: Henter samlingen av merknader for typemedlemmet.

trans-unit.source: The comments in this collection are written to the generated source file just before the declaration of the member.
trans-unit.target: Kommentarer i denne samlingen er skrevet til genererte kildefilen like før deklarasjonen for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection"></xref> that indicates the comments for the member.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeCommentStatementCollection"> </xref> som angir kommentarene for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the custom attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir egendefinerte attributter for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to add metadata attributes to the declaration of the member.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes til å legge til metadataene attributter i deklarasjonen for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This property is `null` by default and should be checked for content before being referenced.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Denne egenskapen er `null` som standard og skal kontrolleres for innhold før det refereres til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection"></xref> that indicates the custom attributes of the member.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeAttributeDeclarationCollection"> </xref> som angir egendefinerte attributter for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the end directives for the member.
trans-unit.target: Henter end-direktivene for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection"></xref> object containing end directives.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection"> </xref> objektet som inneholder slutten direktivene.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the line on which the type member statement occurs.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir linjen som forekommer typen member-setningen.

trans-unit.source: This property indicates the location of the type member declaration.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir plasseringen av typen medlem-deklarering.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used for error reporting and debugging.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes for feil rapportering og feilsøking.

trans-unit.source: The location of the type member declaration can be useful when code is generated based on a template file.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av typen medlem deklarasjonen kan være nyttig når koden genereres basert på en malfil.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > This value is `null` by default and should be checked for content before being referenced.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Denne verdien er `null` som standard og skal kontrolleres for innhold før det refereres til.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma"></xref> object that indicates the location of the type member declaration.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeLinePragma"> </xref> objekt som angir plasseringen av typen medlem-deklarering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the member.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir navnet på medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: The name of the member.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the start directives for the member.
trans-unit.target: Henter start direktivene for medlemmet.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection"></xref> object containing start directives.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeDirectiveCollection"> </xref> objektet som inneholder starte direktivene.
